description:
'''Infected Mushroom''' ({{langx|he|אינפקטד מאשרום}}) is an [[Israelis|Israeli]] musical duo formed in [[Haifa]] in 1996 by producers '''Erez Eisen''' and '''Amit Duvdevani'''. They produce and perform [[psytrance]], [[electronica]], [[dream trance]] and [[psychedelic music]]. They are one of the best-selling groups in [[Israeli music|Israeli music history]] in terms of both domestic and international sales.

They employ a variety of musical sources, including [[acoustic guitar]]s and complex [[Synthesizer|synthesized]] basses. Their compositions often contain changes of [[drum beat]] and [[tempo]]. Infected Mushroom's live shows feature [[Singing|vocals]] and [[Analog device|analogue]] instruments in performances that are set against a [[multimedia]] backdrop.
